channel.title: Nicholas Burns on United-States-of-America.eu
channel.description: Recent content in Nicholas Burns on United-States-of-America.eu

item.title: Email sent to Lindy C. Ransom, Office Management Specialist at the U.S. Embassy in Beijing
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-09_2058_0800_email_to_lindy_ransom_us_embassy_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: FW: My call to the U.S. Embassy Legal Attaché Office Date sent: March 09, 2024, 20:58 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Lindy C. Ransom (OMS at the U.S. Embassy, Beijing, China) Cc: Nicholas Burns (U.S. Ambassador) Dear Ms. Ransom, I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to bring to your attention a matter of importance regarding the communications I have been sending to Ambassador Burns.

item.title: Open Letter to U.S. Ambassador to China Nicholas Burns Regarding Human Rights and Peaceful Protest
item.description: Date sent: December 11, 2023, 21:38 (China Standard Time) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-11-open-letter-to-ambassador-nicholas-burns.pdf On LinkedIn: On X (Twitter): Open letter to @USAmbChina Dear Ambassador Burns, I recently read your statement on International Human Rights Day 2023 with great interest and appreciation, particularly given my own experiences with human rights violations in China. Having endured what could only be… pic.twitter.com/VX9rppPIir — Vincent B. Le Corre (@VincentBLeCorre) December 11, 2023

item.title: Open Letter to U.S. Ambassador to China Nicholas Burns Regarding Human Rights and Peaceful Protest
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-11-open-letter-to-ambassador-nicholas-burns.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: Open Letter to Ambassador Nicholas Burns Regarding Human Rights and Peaceful Protest Date sent: December 11, 2023, 21:38 (China Standard Time) To: Nicholas Burns (U.S. Ambassador) Cc: Catherine Colonna (French Minister for Europe and Foreign Affairs), Bertrand Lortholary (Ambassador of France to China), Roy Guillaume (France Consul General - China), Edward Lehman, Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-11-open-letter-to-ambassador-nicholas-burns.

item.title: Open Letter to French Foreign Office Minister Catherine Colonna, French Ambassador to China Bertrand Lortholary, Consul General Guillaume Roy, forwarded to Ambassador Burns and U.S. Attorney General Merrick Garland
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-11_1353_0800_open_letter_to_colonna_lortholary_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: Open Letter: Urgent Request for Resolution and Clarification on Critical Matters Date sent: December 11, 2023, 13:53 (China Standard Time) To: Catherine Colonna (French Minister for Europe and Foreign Affairs), Bertrand Lortholary (Ambassador of France to China), Roy Guillaume (France Consul General - China) Cc: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department), Edward Lehman I asked Assistant Legal Attaché to forward my communication to:

item.title: Money laundering, 18 U.S.C. § 1957. Formal notice sent to Neuberger Berman’s CEO Mr. George Walker regarding McDonald’s Corporation
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-03-16_0042_0800_formal_notice_to_george_walker_neuberger_berman_with_email_Redacted.pdf KEY POINT OF THIS EMAIL: I formally notified Neuberger Berman that “Neuberger Berman has invested in a company which has engaged in a pattern of racketeering activity” and that therefore “Neuberger Berman is about to commit the crime of money laundering as defined in 18 U.S.C. § 1957 and the purpose of this communication is to try to alert [them] of what has happened so far in the McDonald’s RICO case.

item.title: Email sent on 2022-12-31 to the U.S. Ambassador to China, Nicholas Burns
item.description:
From: Vincent B. Le Corre
Subject: Open letter to Mr. Nicholas Burns and to the U.S. Ambassador to China
Date sent: December 31, 2022 at 01:36 +0800 (China Standard Time)
To: Nicholas Burns (U.S. Ambassador)

item.title: Email sent on 2022-05-12 to the F.B.I. and CCed to the U.S. Ambassadors to France and to China
item.description:
Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2022-05-12_2320_0800_I_shared_a_folder_with_the_FBI_containing_evidence.pdf

On 2022-05-12, I sent an email to the F.B.I. and CCed it to Denise BAUER, U.S. Ambassador to France, and Nicholas BURNS, U.S. Ambassador to China.

FROM : Vincent B. Le Corre

TO : Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

CC : Denise Bauer (U.S. Ambassador), Nicholas Burns (U.S. Ambassador), [REDACTED: the email was CCed to three additional people]

SUBJECT: I shared a folder with the FBI containing evidence

DATE: 2022-05-12 at 23:20 +0800 (China Standard Time)
